artist: Artist: Rembrandt van Rijn; Artist: Plate reworked by Johannes van Vliet
catalogue_raissonne: New Hollstein 25 iii/x; Hind 82 i; White+Boon 355 ii
creditline: Gift of Elizabeth, Julie, and Catherine Andrus in memory of John and Marion Andrus
description: head and shoulders of an old woman wearing a large fabric headdress and a garment with a fur-lined collar; facing to the R of the picture plane
inscription:
Inscription

lettered in plate, upper left: [Rt 163]

in graphite on verso: B.355 II / H 82 I / [unidentified monogram] 322
provenance: John E. Andrus III, Wayzata, Minn.; by descent to his daughters, Elizabeth, Katie, and Julie; gave to MIA, 2015. Earlier provenances have been gathered, but further research will increase our knowledge of their histories.
title: Bust of Woman in Heavy Headdress
